nodes.text: The Frinn Mak Traveling Circus was a circus that traveled throughout the galaxy. At some point after the Garsea family left the planet Batuu  around 21 ABY, the circus was heading for Cuyacan when it rescued the stranded smuggler Izal Garsea aboard her starship, the Meridian, after it ran out of fuel.
The Frinn Mak Traveling Circus was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
